input.description: adapter name [Optional] The name of the adapter that is enabled on the Peer. The default adapter name is HPSEActor

1. Lists fabrics. Sample Request XML:
<items> <item> <command>list</command> <category>fabric</category> <process-id>find-fabric-details</process-id> <command-arguments> <all/> </command-arguments> </item> </items>
Parameters Description:
command[Required] The actual command type that will be executed. category[Required] This parameter identifies the top-level functional category. process-id[Required] Unique identifier for the process workflow. all[Required] Indicates that details of all the fabrics are required.
2. Lists the devices in all discovered fabrics, such as hosts, switches, and storage systems.
Sample Request XML:
<items> <item> <command>list</command> <category>fabric</category> <process-id>find-fabric-details</process-id> <command-arguments> <all/> <device/> </command-arguments> </item> </items>
Parameters Description:
command[Required] The actual command type that will be executed. category[Required] This parameter identifies the top-level functional category. process-id[Required] Unique identifier for the process workflow. all[Required] Indicates that details of all the fabrics are required. device[Required] Indicates that details of devices in all the fabrics are required.
3. Lists the applications in fabrics.
Sample Request XML:
<items> <item> <command>list</command> <category>fabric</category> <process-id>find-fabric-details</process-id> <command-arguments> <all/> <application/> </command-arguments> </item> </items>
Parameters Description:
command[Required] The actual command type that will be executed. category[Required] This parameter identifies the top-level functional category. process-id[Required] Unique identifier for the process workflow. all[Required] Indicates that details of all the fabrics are required. application[Required] Indicates that details of application in all the fabrics are required.
4. Lists the hosts in fabrics.
Sample Request XML:
<items> <item> <command>list</command> <category>fabric</category> <process-id>find-fabric-details</process-id> <command-arguments> <all/> <host/> </command-arguments> </item> </items>
Parameters Description:
command[Required] The actual command type that will be executed. category[Required] This parameter identifies the top-level functional category. process-id[Required] Unique identifier for the process workflow. all[Required] Indicates that details of all the fabrics are required. host[Required] Indicates that details of host in all the fabrics are required.
5. Lists the Fibre Channel ports in the fabrics.
Sample Request XML:
<items> <item> <command>list</command> <category>fabric</category> <process-id>find-fabric-details</process-id> <command-arguments> <all/> <port/> </command-arguments> </item> </items>
Parameters Description:
command[Required] The actual command type that will be executed. category[Required] This parameter identifies the top-level functional category. process-id[Required] Unique identifier for the process workflow. all[Required] Indicates that details of all the fabrics are required. port[Required] Indicates that details of port in all the fabrics are required.
6. Lists the switches in fabrics.
Sample Request XML:
<items> <item> <command>list</command> <category>fabric</category> <process-id>find-fabric-details</process-id> <command-arguments> <all/> <switch/> </command-arguments> </item> </items>
Parameters Description:
command[Required] The actual command type that will be executed. category[Required] This parameter identifies the top-level functional category. process-id[Required] Unique identifier for the process workflow. all[Required] Indicates that details of all the fabrics are required. switch[Required] Indicates that details of switch in all the fabrics are required.
7. Lists the storage systems in fabrics.
Sample Request XML: <items> <item> <command>list</command> <category>fabric</category> <process-id>find-fabric-details</process-id> <command-arguments> <all/> <storagesystem/> </command-arguments> </item> </items>
Parameters Description:
command[Required] The actual command type that will be executed. category[Required] This parameter identifies the top-level functional category. process-id[Required] Unique identifier for the process workflow. all[Required] Indicates that details of all the fabrics are required. storagesystem[Required] Indicates that details of storagesystem in all the fabrics are required.
8. Lists the tape libraries in fabrics.
Sample Request XML: <items> <item> <command>list</command> <category>fabric</category> <process-id>find-fabric-details</process-id> <command-arguments> <all/> <tapelibrary/> </command-arguments> </item> </items>
Parameters Description:
command[Required] The actual command type that will be executed. category[Required] This parameter identifies the top-level functional category. process-id[Required] Unique identifier for the process workflow. all[Required] Indicates that details of all the fabrics are required. tapelibrary[Required] Indicates that details of tapelibrary in all the fabrics are required.
9. Lists the zone sets in fabrics.
Sample Request XML: <items> <item> <command>list</command> <category>fabric</category> <process-id>find-fabric-details</process-id> <command-arguments> <all/> <zoneset/> </command-arguments> </item> </items>
Parameters Description:
command[Required] The actual command type that will be executed. category[Required] This parameter identifies the top-level functional category. process-id[Required] Unique identifier for the process workflow. all[Required] Indicates that details of all the fabrics are required. zoneset[Required] Indicates that details of zoneset in all the fabrics are required.
10. Lists the zones in fabrics.
Sample Request XML: <items> <item> <command>list</command> <category>fabric</category> <process-id>find-fabric-details</process-id> <command-arguments> <all/> <zone/> </command-arguments> </item> </items>
Parameters Description:
command[Required] The actual command type that will be executed. category[Required] This parameter identifies the top-level functional category. process-id[Required] Unique identifier for the process workflow. all[Required] Indicates that details of all the fabrics are required. zone[Required] Indicates that details of zone in all the fabrics are required.
11. Lists the zone aliases in fabrics.
Sample Request XML: <items> <item> <command>list</command> <category>fabric</category> <process-id>find-fabric-details</process-id> <command-arguments> <all/> <zonealias/> </command-arguments> </item> </items>
Parameters Description:
command[Required] The actual command type that will be executed. category[Required] This parameter identifies the top-level functional category. process-id[Required] Unique identifier for the process workflow. all[Required] Indicates that details of all the fabrics are required. zonealias[Required] Indicates that details of zonealias in all the fabrics are required.
12. Displays the world wide name of the specified fabric and its fabric identifier.
Sample Request XML: <items> <item> <command>list</command> <category>fabric</category> <process-id>find-fabric-details</process-id> <command-arguments> <fabric-id>1234</fabric-id> </command-arguments> </item> </items>
Parameters Description:
command[Required] The actual command type that will be executed. category[Required] This parameter identifies the top-level functional category. process-id[Required] Unique identifier for the process workflow. fabric-id[Required] id of the fabric whose details are required.
13. Lists the hosts, switches, storage systems, and applications in the fabric specified by <fabric-id>.
Sample Request XML: <items> <item> <command>list</command> <category>fabric</category> <process-id>find-fabric-details</process-id> <command-arguments> <fabric-id>1234</fabric-id> <device/> </command-arguments> </item> </items>
Parameters Description:
command[Required] The actual command type that will be executed. category[Required] This parameter identifies the top-level functional category. process-id[Required] Unique identifier for the process workflow. fabric-id[Required] id of the fabric whose details are required. device[Required] Indicates that details of hosts, switches, storage systems, and applications in the fabric specified by <fabric-id> are required.
14. Lists the applications in the fabric specified by <fabric-id>, where <fabric-id> is the fabric identifier.
Sample Request XML: <items> <item> <command>list</command> <category>fabric</category> <process-id>find-fabric-details</process-id> <command-arguments> <fabric-id>1234</fabric-id> <application/> </command-arguments> </item> </items>
Parameters Description:
command[Required] The actual command type that will be executed. category[Required] This parameter identifies the top-level functional category. process-id[Required] Unique identifier for the process workflow. fabric-id[Required] id of the fabric whose details are required. application[Required] Indicates that details of applications in the fabric specified by <fabric-id> are required.
15. Lists the hosts in the fabric specified by <fabric-id>.
Sample Request XML: <items> <item> <command>list</command> <category>fabric</category> <process-id>find-fabric-details</process-id> <command-arguments> <fabric-id>1234</fabric-id> <host/> </command-arguments> </item> </items>
Parameters Description:
command[Required] The actual command type that will be executed. category[Required] This parameter identifies the top-level functional category. process-id[Required] Unique identifier for the process workflow. fabric-id[Required] id of the fabric whose details are required. host[Required] Indicates that details of hosts in the fabric specified by <fabric-id> are required.
16. Lists the Fibre Channel ports in the specified fabric.
Sample Request XML: <items> <item> <command>list</command> <category>fabric</category> <process-id>find-fabric-details</process-id> <command-arguments> <fabric-id>1234</fabric-id> <port/> </command-arguments> </item> </items>
Parameters Description:
command[Required] The actual command type that will be executed. category[Required] This parameter identifies the top-level functional category. process-id[Required] Unique identifier for the process workflow. fabric-id[Required] id of the fabric whose details are required. port[Required] Indicates that details of ports in the fabric specified by <fabric-id> are required.
17. Lists the switches in the fabric specified by <fabric-id>.
Sample Request XML: <items> <item> <command>list</command> <category>fabric</category> <process-id>find-fabric-details</process-id> <command-arguments> <fabric-id>1234</fabric-id> <switch/> </command-arguments> </item> </items>
Parameters Description:
command[Required] The actual command type that will be executed. category[Required] This parameter identifies the top-level functional category. process-id[Required] Unique identifier for the process workflow. fabric-id[Required] id of the fabric whose details are required. switch[Required] Indicates that details of switches in the fabric specified by <fabric-id> are required.
18. Lists the storage systems in the fabric specified by <fabric-id>.
Sample Request XML: <items> <item> <command>list</command> <category>fabric</category> <process-id>find-fabric-details</process-id> <command-arguments> <fabric-id>1234</fabric-id> <storagesystem/> </command-arguments> </item> </items>
Parameters Description:
command[Required] The actual command type that will be executed. category[Required] This parameter identifies the top-level functional category. process-id[Required] Unique identifier for the process workflow. fabric-id[Required] id of the fabric whose details are required. storagesystem[Required] Indicates that details of storagesystems in the fabric specified by <fabric-id> are required.
19. Provides tape library in the fabric specified by <fabric-id>.
Sample Request XML: <items> <item> <command>list</command> <category>fabric</category> <process-id>find-fabric-details</process-id> <command-arguments> <fabric-id>1234</fabric-id> <tapelibrary/> </command-arguments> </item> </items>
Parameters Description:
command[Required] The actual command type that will be executed. category[Required] This parameter identifies the top-level functional category. process-id[Required] Unique identifier for the process workflow. fabric-id[Required] id of the fabric whose details are required. tapelibrary[Required] Indicates that details of tapelibraries in the fabric specified by <fabric-id> are required.
20. Lists the zone sets in the fabric specified by <fabric-id>.
Sample Request XML: <items> <item> <command>list</command> <category>fabric</category> <process-id>find-fabric-details</process-id> <command-arguments> <fabric-id>1234</fabric-id> <zoneset/> </command-arguments> </item> </items>
Parameters Description:
command[Required] The actual command type that will be executed. category[Required] This parameter identifies the top-level functional category. process-id[Required] Unique identifier for the process workflow. fabric-id[Required] id of the fabric whose details are required. zoneset[Required] Indicates that details of zonesets in the fabric specified by <fabric-id> are required.
21. Lists the zones in the fabric specified by <fabric-id>.
Sample Request XML: <items> <item> <command>list</command> <category>fabric</category> <process-id>find-fabric-details</process-id> <command-arguments> <fabric-id>1234</fabric-id> <zone/> </command-arguments> </item> </items>
Parameters Description:
command[Required] The actual command type that will be executed. category[Required] This parameter identifies the top-level functional category. process-id[Required] Unique identifier for the process workflow. fabric-id[Required] id of the fabric whose details are required. zone[Required] Indicates that details of zones in the fabric specified by <fabric-id> are required.
22. Lists the zone aliases in the fabric specified by <fabric-id>.
Sample Request XML: <items> <item> <command>list</command> <category>fabric</category> <process-id>find-fabric-details</process-id> <command-arguments> <fabric-id>1234</fabric-id> <zonealias/> </command-arguments> </item> </items>
Parameters Description:
command[Required] The actual command type that will be executed. category[Required] This parameter identifies the top-level functional category. process-id[Required] Unique identifier for the process workflow. fabric-id[Required] id of the fabric whose details are required. zonealias[Required] Indicates that details of zonealias in the fabric specified by <fabric-id> are required.
23. Provides a detailed description of the fabrics managed by the management server.
Sample Request XML: <items> <item> <command>show</command> <category>fabric</category> <process-id>find-fabric-details</process-id> <command-arguments> <all/> </command-arguments> </item> </items>
Parameters Description:
command[Required] The actual command type that will be executed. category[Required] This parameter identifies the top-level functional category. process-id[Required] Unique identifier for the process workflow. all[Required] indicates that all details of the fabric are required.
24. Provides a detailed description of the elements, such as hosts, switches, and storage, in the fabrics managed by the management server.
Sample Request XML: <items> <item> <command>show</command> <category>fabric</category> <process-id>find-fabric-details</process-id> <command-arguments> <all/> <device/> </command-arguments> </item> </items>
Parameters Description:
command[Required] The actual command type that will be executed. category[Required] This parameter identifies the top-level functional category. process-id[Required] Unique identifier for the process workflow. all[Required] indicates that all details of the fabric are required. device[Required] Indicates that details of devices in all the fabrics are required.
25. Provides a detailed description of the applications in the fabrics managed by the management server. Sample Request XML: <items> <item> <command>show</command> <category>fabric</category> <process-id>find-fabric-details</process-id> <command-arguments> <all/> <application/> </command-arguments> </item> </items>
Parameters Description:
command[Required] The actual command type that will be executed. category[Required] This parameter identifies the top-level functional category. process-id[Required] Unique identifier for the process workflow. all[Required] indicates that all details of the fabric are required. application[Required] Indicates that details of applications in all the fabrics are required.
26. Provides a detailed description of the hosts in the fabrics managed by the management server. Sample Request XML: <items> <item> <command>show</command> <category>fabric</category> <process-id>find-fabric-details</process-id> <command-arguments> <all/> <host/> </command-arguments> </item> </items>
Parameters Description:
command[Required] The actual command type that will be executed. category[Required] This parameter identifies the top-level functional category. process-id[Required] Unique identifier for the process workflow. all[Required] indicates that all details of the fabric are required. host[Required] Indicates that details of hosts in all the fabrics are required.
27. Provides a detailed description of the Fibre Channel ports in the fabrics managed by the management server. Inter Switch Link (ISL) trunking information is also provided, if accessible, for supported switches. Sample Request XML: <items> <item> <command>show</command> <category>fabric</category> <process-id>find-fabric-details</process-id> <command-arguments> <all/> <port/> </command-arguments> </item> </items>
Parameters Description:
command[Required] The actual command type that will be executed. category[Required] This parameter identifies the top-level functional category. process-id[Required] Unique identifier for the process workflow. all[Required] indicates that all details of the fabric are required. port[Required] Indicates that details of ports in all the fabrics are required.
28. Provides a detailed description of the switches in the fabrics managed by the management server. Sample Request XML: <items> <item> <command>show</command> <category>fabric</category> <process-id>find-fabric-details</process-id> <command-arguments> <all/> <switch/> </command-arguments> </item> </items>
Parameters Description:
command[Required] The actual command type that will be executed. category[Required] This parameter identifies the top-level functional category. process-id[Required] Unique identifier for the process workflow. all[Required] indicates that all details of the fabric are required. switch[Required] Indicates that details of switches in all the fabrics are required.
29. Provides a detailed description of the storage systems in the fabrics managed by the management server. Sample Request XML: <items> <item> <command>show</command> <category>fabric</category> <process-id>find-fabric-details</process-id> <command-arguments> <all/> <storagesystem/> </command-arguments> </item> </items>
Parameters Description:
command[Required] The actual command type that will be executed. category[Required] This parameter identifies the top-level functional category. process-id[Required] Unique identifier for the process workflow. all[Required] indicates that all details of the fabric are required. storagesystem[Required] Indicates that details of storagesystems in all the fabrics are required.
30. Provides a detailed description of the tape libraries in the fabrics managed by the management server. Sample Request XML: <items> <item> <command>show</command> <category>fabric</category> <process-id>find-fabric-details</process-id> <command-arguments> <all/> <tapelibrary/> </command-arguments> </item> </items>
Parameters Description:
command[Required] The actual command type that will be executed. category[Required] This parameter identifies the top-level functional category. process-id[Required] Unique identifier for the process workflow. all[Required] indicates that all details of the fabric are required. tapelibrary[Required] Indicates that details of tapelibraries in all the fabrics are required.
31. Provides a detailed description of the zone sets in the fabrics managed by the management server. Sample Request XML: <items> <item> <command>show</command> <category>fabric</category> <process-id>find-fabric-details</process-id> <command-arguments> <all/> <zoneset/> </command-arguments> </item> </items>
Parameters Description:
command[Required] The actual command type that will be executed. category[Required] This parameter identifies the top-level functional category. process-id[Required] Unique identifier for the process workflow. all[Required] indicates that all details of the fabric are required. zoneset[Required] Indicates that details of zonesets in all the fabrics are required.
32. Provides a detailed description of the zones in the fabrics managed by the management server. Sample Request XML: <items> <item> <command>show</command> <category>fabric</category> <process-id>find-fabric-details</process-id> <command-arguments> <all/> <zone/> </command-arguments> </item> </items>
Parameters Description:
command[Required] The actual command type that will be executed. category[Required] This parameter identifies the top-level functional category. process-id[Required] Unique identifier for the process workflow. all[Required] indicates that all details of the fabric are required. zone[Required] Indicates that details of zone in all the fabrics are required.
33. Provides a detailed description of the zone aliases in the fabrics managed by the management server. Sample Request XML: <items> <item> <command>show</command> <category>fabric</category> <process-id>find-fabric-details</process-id> <command-arguments> <all/> <zonealias/> </command-arguments> </item> </items>
Parameters Description:
command[Required] The actual command type that will be executed. category[Required] This parameter identifies the top-level functional category. process-id[Required] Unique identifier for the process workflow. all[Required] indicates that all details of the fabric are required. zonealias[Required] Indicates that details of zonealias in all the fabrics are required.
34. Provides a detailed description of the fabric specified by <fabric-id>. Sample Request XML: <items> <item> <command>show</command> <category>fabric</category> <process-id>find-fabric-details</process-id> <command-arguments> <fabric-id>1234</fabric-id> </command-arguments> </item> </items>
Parameters Description:
command[Required] The actual command type that will be executed. category[Required] This parameter identifies the top-level functional category. process-id[Required] Unique identifier for the process workflow. fabric-id[Required] id of the fabric whose details are required.
35. Provides a detailed description of the applications, hosts, switches, storage systems, zone sets, zones, and paths in the fabric specified by <fabric-id>. Sample Request XML: <items> <item> <command>show</command> <category>fabric</category> <process-id>find-fabric-details</process-id> <command-arguments> <fabric-id>1234</fabric-id> <device/> </command-arguments> </item> </items>
Parameters Description:
command[Required] The actual command type that will be executed. category[Required] This parameter identifies the top-level functional category. process-id[Required] Unique identifier for the process workflow. fabric-id[Required] id of the fabric whose details are required. device[Required] Indicates that details of hosts, switches, storage systems, and applications in the fabric specified by <fabric-id> are required.
36. Provides a detailed description of the applications in the fabric specified by <fabric-id>. Sample Request XML: <items> <item> <command>show</command> <category>fabric</category> <process-id>find-fabric-details</process-id> <command-arguments> <fabric-id>1234</fabric-id> <application/> </command-arguments> </item> </items>
Parameters Description:
command[Required] The actual command type that will be executed. category[Required] This parameter identifies the top-level functional category. process-id[Required] Unique identifier for the process workflow. fabric-id[Required] id of the fabric whose details are required. application[Required] Indicates that details of applications in the fabric specified by <fabric-id> are required.
37. Provides a detailed description of the hosts in the fabric specified by <fabric-id>. Sample Request XML: <items> <item> <command>show</command> <category>fabric</category> <process-id>find-fabric-details</process-id> <command-arguments> <fabric-id>1234</fabric-id> <host/> </command-arguments> </item> </items>
Parameters Description:
command[Required] The actual command type that will be executed. category[Required] This parameter identifies the top-level functional category. process-id[Required] Unique identifier for the process workflow. fabric-id[Required] id of the fabric whose details are required. host[Required] Indicates that details of hosts in the fabric specified by <fabric-id> are required.

Inter Switch Link (ISL) trunking information is also provided, if accessible, for supported switches. Sample Request XML: <items> <item> <command>show</command> <category>fabric</category> <process-id>find-fabric-details</process-id> <command-arguments> <fabric-id>1234</fabric-id> <port/> </command-arguments> </item> </items>
Parameters Description:
command[Required] The actual command type that will be executed. category[Required] This parameter identifies the top-level functional category. process-id[Required] Unique identifier for the process workflow. fabric-id[Required] id of the fabric whose details are required. port[Required] Indicates that details of ports in the fabric specified by <fabric-id> are required.
39. Provides a detailed description of the switches in the fabric specified by <fabric-id>. Inter Switch Link (ISL) trunking information is also provided, if accessible, for supported switches. Sample Request XML: <items> <item> <command>show</command> <category>fabric</category> <process-id>find-fabric-details</process-id> <command-arguments> <fabric-id>1234</fabric-id> <switch/> </command-arguments> </item> </items>
Parameters Description:
command[Required] The actual command type that will be executed. category[Required] This parameter identifies the top-level functional category. process-id[Required] Unique identifier for the process workflow. fabric-id[Required] id of the fabric whose details are required. switch[Required] Indicates that details of switches in the fabric specified by <fabric-id> are required.
40. Provides a detailed description of the storage systems in the fabric specified by <fabric-id>. Sample Request XML: <items> <item> <command>show</command> <category>fabric</category> <process-id>find-fabric-details</process-id> <command-arguments> <fabric-id>1234</fabric-id> <storagesystem/> </command-arguments> </item> </items>

command[Required] The actual command type that will be executed. category[Required] This parameter identifies the top-level functional category. process-id[Required] Unique identifier for the process workflow. fabric-id[Required] id of the fabric whose details are required. storagesystem[Required] Indicates that details of storagesystems in the fabric specified by <fabric-id> are required.
41. Provides a detailed description of the tape libraries in the fabric specified by <fabric-id>. Sample Request XML: <items> <item> <command>show</command> <category>fabric</category> <process-id>find-fabric-details</process-id> <command-arguments> <fabric-id>1234</fabric-id> <tapelibrary/> </command-arguments> </item> </items>

42. Provides a detailed description of the zone sets in the fabric specified by <fabric-id>. Sample Request XML: <items> <item> <command>show</command> <category>fabric</category> <process-id>find-fabric-details</process-id> <command-arguments> <fabric-id>1234</fabric-id> <zoneset/> </command-arguments> </item> </items>

43. Provides a detailed description of the zones in the fabric specified by <fabric-id>. Sample Request XML: <items> <item> <command>show</command> <category>fabric</category> <process-id>find-fabric-details</process-id> <command-arguments> <fabric-id>1234</fabric-id> <zone/> </command-arguments> </item> </items>

44. Provides a detailed description of the zone aliases in the fabric specified by <fabric-id>. Sample Request XML: <items> <item> <command>show</command> <category>fabric</category> <process-id>find-fabric-details</process-id> <command-arguments> <fabric-id>1234</fabric-id> <zonealias/> </command-arguments> </item> </items>
Parameters Description:
command[Required] The actual command type that will be executed. category[Required] This parameter identifies the top-level functional category. process-id[Required] Unique identifier for the process workflow. fabric-id[Required] id of the fabric whose details are required. zonealias[Required] Indicates that details of zonealias in the fabric specified by <fabric-id> are required.

documentation.description:
This wrapper supports the following requirements:-
1. Lists fabrics. 2. Lists the devices in all discovered fabrics, such as hosts, switches, and storage systems. 3. Lists the applications in fabrics. 4. Lists the hosts in fabrics. 5. Lists the Fibre Channel ports in the fabrics. 6. Lists the switches in fabrics. 7. Lists the storage systems in fabrics. 8. Lists the tape libraries in fabrics. 9. Lists the zone sets in fabrics. 10. Lists the zones in fabrics. 11. Lists the zone aliases in fabrics. 12. Displays the world wide name of the specified fabric and its fabric identifier. 13. Lists the hosts, switches, storage systems, and applications in the fabric specified by <fabric id>. 14. Lists the applications in the fabric specified by <fabric id>, where <fabric id> is the fabric identifier. The fabric identifier can be obtained using several methods, such as the appiqlist -fabric -all command. 15. Lists the hosts in the fabric specified by <fabric id>. 16. Lists the Fibre Channel ports in the specified fabric. 17. Lists the switches in the fabric specified by <fabric id>. 18. Lists the storage systems in the fabric specified by <fabric id>. 19. Provides tape library in the fabric specified by <fabric id>. 20. Lists the zone sets in the fabric specified by <fabric id>. 21. Lists the zones in the fabric specified by <fabric id>. 22. Lists the zone aliases in the fabric specified by <fabric id>. 23. Provides a detailed description of the fabrics managed by the management server. 24. Provides a detailed description of the elements, such as hosts, switches, and storage, in the fabrics managed by the management server. 25. Provides a detailed description of the applications in the fabrics managed by the management server. 26. Provides a detailed description of the hosts in the fabrics managed by the management server. 27. Provides a detailed description of the Fibre Channel ports in the fabrics managed by the management server. Inter Switch Link (ISL) trunking information is also provided, if accessible, for supported switches. 28. Provides a detailed description of the switches in the fabrics managed by the management server. 29. Provides a detailed description of the storage systems in the fabrics managed by the management server. 30. Provides a detailed description of the tape libraries in the fabrics managed by the management server. 31. Provides a detailed description of the zone sets in the fabrics managed by the management server. 32. Provides a detailed description of the zones in the fabrics managed by the management server. 33. Provides a detailed description of the zone aliases in the fabrics managed by the management server. 34. Provides a detailed description of the fabric specified by <fabric id>. 35.
